# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is how you can implement this in Julia:

```julia
function wrap_string(s, text_width = 10)
    words = split(s, ' ')
    result = ""
    line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(line * " $word") > text_width
            result *= "$line\n"
            line = word
        else
            line *= " $word"
        end
    end
    result *= "$line"
    return result
end
```

Here's an example of using the function:

```julia
println(wrap_string("This is a test. This is only a test."))
```

The output will be:

```text
This is a 
test. This 
is only a 
test.
```
